# core-spinner

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                   | Type                                                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Color of the spinner.         | `"black" \| "blue" \| "green" \| "red" \| "yellow"` | `"black"`   |
| `size`   | `size`    | The pre-defined spinner size. | `"default" \| "large" \| "small"`                   | `"default"` |
